item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

3. Pirate library must pay publishers $30M, but no one knows who runs it (60 points | 16 comments)

26. Another new wasp species discovered by researchers (25 points | 13 comments)
